## types.Join type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Join<T extends any[], U extends string | number, ACC extends string = ""> = T extends [infer A extends string, ...infer RT extends string[]] ? RT["length"] extends 0 ? `${ACC}${A}` : Join<RT, U, `${ACC}${A}${U}`> : ACC;
```
